title: For those complaining about DJ Sona's voice...
body:
Play her VO alongside the songs that her skin has. You'll see what I'm talking about.

It's supposed to be a complement to the music. You aren't supposed to understand what she's saying as much as let what she "says" integrate into the songs. They took her normal lines and made them into musical dribble that fits any of the songs that come with her skin. And honestly, it's badass.

VO:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JgaxVzYurPI

Songs:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tny2nx9kz0g

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zX7UWavbT5g
